item.title: The Airlift Dream
item.description: On the 1st day of Eid, 10th of July, in the morning, I got a call from my manager. He asked me to cancel all the orders except the Eid ones. I thought that maybe we got more orders than we were expecting. Right after that call, I got another call from our Platform Integrity Lead, he told me that the Eid orders were not landing on the warehouses and shared a video call link to join.

item.title: Contact

item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
